title: New apartment for sale in Colombo 6
details: This newly built apartment is situated 100 metres away from Hampden Lane, Wellawatte. Floor area 830 sq.ft. It has 2 bedrooms with 2 attached bathrooms. Unfurnished. Has a modern pantry. A/C in both rooms and hot water in both bathrooms. The apartment complex has a swimming pool, gym, and rooftop terrace. 1 parking slot available. Price 15.5Mn.
